channel.title: Act 3 :: SANS Holiday Hack Challenge 2025
channel.description: The Gnomes want to transform the neighborhood so that it’s frozen solid year-round, an environmental disaster. But who is the mastermind behind the Gnomes’ wickedness?

item.title: Gnome Tea
item.description: Objective Difficulty: 3/5 Enter the apartment building near 24-7 and help Thomas infiltrate the GnomeTea social network and discover the secret agent passphrase. Thomas Bouve mission statement Hi there, I’m Thomas, but you can call me CraHan if you like. What do you mean ‘weird accent’? I have no idea why people keep telling me that, but it sounds fine in my head, to be honest.

item.title: Hack-a-Gnome
item.description: Objective Difficulty: 3/5 Davis in the Data Center is fighting a gnome army—join the hack-a-gnome fun. Chris Daves mission statement Hi, my name is Chris. I like miniature war gaming and painting minis. I enjoy open source projects and amateur robotics. Hiking and kayaking are my favorite IRL activies. I love single player video games with great stoylines. Hey, I could really use another set of eyes on this gnome takeover situation.

item.title: Snowcat RCE & Priv Esc
item.description: Objective Difficulty: 3/5 Enter the apartment building near 24-7 and help Thomas infiltrate the GnomeTea social network and discover the secret agent passphrase. I have no idea why people keep telling me that, but it sounds fine in my head, to be honest.

item.title: Schrödingers Scope
item.description: Objective Difficulty: 1/5 Skate over to Jared at the frozen pond for some network magic and learn the ropes by the hockey rink. XXX mission statement Solution XXX mission debrief
